titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Mayor's Court of the City of New York record 1991.032
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:12:43 +0000.

did.unittitle: Mayor's Court of the City of New York record
did.abstract: A document pertaining to a complaint brought against New York City resident Nathaniel Tyler in the Mayor's Court of the City of New York, dated 1771.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Mayor's Court of the City of New York record, 1991.032, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1991.
